title: Fun little trivia about Morde's german title
body:
It's been a while since I played the german version of the game but starved of Morde content I was browsing the german wiki and found a pretty cool translation.

We all know Morde's current title is **"The Iron Revenant"** which would roughly translate to **"Der Eiserne Wiedergänger"** in German. Well they didn't translate it word by word apparently.

Because in German he goes by
#DER EISERNE ALBTRAUM

**The Iron Nightmare**, which is pretty damn awesome, I must say.

replies.body:
Another title added to the list.

So far I've gathered 57.

Oh?
You got my attention.

Ehem.

His Majesty Mordekaiser,
_the Master of Metal, the Iron Revenant, Master of the Immortal Bastion, Dark Lord of the Dead, Master of the Black Tower, Master of the Fates of Valoran, the Dreadlord, Warlord of the Easternlands, Tyrant-Sorcerer of the East, the Sorcerer-King, King of the Waste, King on the March, the Iron Tyrant, the Deathless King, the Undying King, Shadow of Damnation, the Coming Darkness, Paladin of Pain, the Stormbringer, the Iron Nightmare, King of the Night, Specter of Power, the Betrayed, the Unspeakable, the Eternal Ruler, Foe to the Kindred, Wolfslayer, He With the Iron Crown, the Returner, Tormentor of Souls, Enslaver of Men, Master of the Ultimate Fate, Master of Lost Souls, King of the Fallen, Inheritor of the Shadow, the Binder, Conqueror of Nations, Terror from the Beyond, the Shadow King, the Bane of Life, the Everlasting, the Master of Afflictions, the Forever-King, Master of the Unhallowed Host, Lord of Accursed Souls, Destroyer of Enemies, Once and Future King, the Unyielding, Lord of the Shadow Isles, Master of the Black Mist, Manipulator of Souls, Master of Life and Death, the Puppet Master, Titan of the Old World, the Prisoner, the Sundered, Murder Emperor_.

This pleases me.

Bravo.

Don't forget the most important one:

Pizza feet man
No, the most important one is “numero one”
And also, The Buggy.

"Wolfslayer"?

https://assets1.ignimgs.com/vid/thumbnails/user/2014/05/09/smaug_thumb2.jpg
##Lovely titles
Kinda clashes with Eternal Nightmare, for that reason I like Iron Revenant a lot more. But sure it fits him. A character like Mordekaiser of course wouldn't/shouldn't have only one title anyway.
Please let him introduce himself by his many aliases Daenerys-style whenever he first meets an enemy.

No, Summon a spooky servant to do it for him. 
Like the occasional Shadow of War orc that doesn't talk but has his own personal hype man
Karthus could sing it when he enters a Room

{{sticker:sg-lux}}
Do you ever _not_ talk about Mordekaiser?
He has done threads about other champions actually.
Not really, makes for some fun dirty talk too ;)
Should one feel pity or jealousy for your s/o then?

It’s not very fitting though. It should be Iron Pleasure because Mordekaiser is really the good guy who was focusing on the real threat while the heroes were fighting amongst themselves and were the actual villians. ~~You know typical modern Marvel comics. ~~
Sound like what it would feel like when you are hard stuck in~~ bronze v~~ ironn iv. Is this the new ELO hell?

Also Mordekaisers name roughly translates to:
"Murderous Emperor."
Im all discombobulated today.
